availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Susan T. Duncan Bozarth in Hancock County on October 17, 1848. Father of W. F. Bozarth, Sarah Bozarth, L. W. Bozarth, Ann Bozarth, J. D. Bozarth, J. W. Bozarth, Eli Bozarth, and Martha Bozarth. Farmer in Hancock County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 93-94.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 26.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Hancock County Marriages, Film #000495729, p.
